title: Survival Nation
shortDescription: Responsible for: solving critical bugs through fast debugging, implementing multiplayer with Photon Fusion and optimizing VR seamless open world for Pico and SteamVR. Additionally, thinking about others' workflow and providing help by creating Unity Editor tools and adding more developer tools for testing. Also responsible of gameplay matters - creating story quests based on design from Game Designer, implementing localization and adding tutorials to the game.

details.content: Gameplay Programmer | Tool Programmer | Optimization Programmer | Networking Programmer | Audio Programmer/Designer

title: 1920: The Telegraphist
shortDescription: Made strategy-rhythm game for HackYeah 2022 during 24 hours in 6-person team as programmer, audio designer and scrum master. Won 2nd place in Game Development #1 - Polish Great Battles category and received recognition from Centrum Rozwoju Przemysłów Kreatywnych (CRPK).

details.content: Scrum Master | Gameplay Programmer | Audio Designer | Game Designer

title: Decorporation
shortDescription: Made 3D FPS commercial game and published on Steam. Worked on a project wearing different hats - scrum master, programmer and UI designer. Programmed things like upgrade system inspired with Hades, camera system with Cinemachine, implementation of external APIs and handled a lot of various bugs. Prior to Steam release this was a gamejam game (named Bulletache back then) made in 5 days for KrakJam 2022 where my responsibilities were similar.

details.content: Project Manager | Scrum Master | Optimization Programmer | Gameplay Programmer | Sound Designer | Cutscene Director | UI Designer

title: Keep it Cool, Man
shortDescription: Worked on arcade fast-paced typing game and released Unity game in 3-person team on Steam for free. Made and designed all user interface (including animations created through C# using DOTween), implemented third-party APIs, created and designed game content (like bomb letters, shotgun letters, etc), made Unity editor tools to speed up development process, handled marketing and PR inquires.

details.content: Gameplay Programmer | Tool Programmer | Animation Programmer (DOTween) | UI/UX Designer

title: This Game Is Broken
shortDescription: Built a game in 72 hours with a four-person team in my first stationary game jam named KrakJam. Programmed mainly content such as bad effects when you pick up the glitches. Improved game after the release with postprocessing effects. Ported Windows game to Android in Unity.

details.content: Gameplay Programmer | Game Designer | Scrum Master
